page.title: 08THE COURT LEET
page.content: The {Court Leet}has been around since the thirteenth century.It has twenty officers and was started by the Lord of the manor.The chief citizen is the {High Bailiff}of the court and each year a new High Bailiff is elected by the men of the town.The High Bailiff takes the lead in all ceremonial occasions,He is like a Mayor of a large town.The clothes he wears are bought from London and are handed down from one Bailiff to another.His chain of office is made of silver gilt and weighs about 2.2 kilograms. The Court Leet was to administrate the village and it was a court of record.A court of record means a court that keeps a record on the town.
